solution_line_template: Reggie makes 3 points off layups because {reggie_layups} x {layup_points} = <<{reggie_layups}*{layup_points}={reggie_layup_score}>>{reggie_layup_score}
Reggie makes 4 points off free-throws because {reggie_free_throws} x {free_throw_points} = <<{reggie_free_throws}*{free_throw_points}={reggie_free_throw_score}>>{reggie_free_throw_score}
Reggie makes 3 points off long shots because {reggie_long_shots} x {long_shot_points} = <<{reggie_long_shots}*{long_shot_points}={reggie_long_shot_score}>>{reggie_long_shot_score}
His brother scores 12 points because {brother_long_shots} x {long_shot_points} = <<{brother_long_shots}*{long_shot_points}={brother_score}>>{brother_score}
